Title: Dead Man Walking
Plot: Captain Jack resurrects Owen with a resurrection glove, only to find out that the new glove isn't quite what they'd bargained for. Owen, in an undead state, helps the team figure out why he's still around.
GuestStars: Freema Agyeman, Kai Owen, Skye Bennett, Paul Kasey, Joanna Griffiths, Ben Walker, Lauren Phillips, Golda Rosheuvel, Janie Booth, Rhys Ap William
